content.raw: @_jrivero_, I found some small bugs in GuiIface_TEST that may have caused it to fail on Jenkins. In particular, if I ran the tests in random order, noINIFile would often fail because the INI property it expected to be at a default value was being set by a previous test. I modified it by calling boost::filesystem::remove(path) and gazebo::gui::stop() after each test, to return the system to its initial state. I'll start another Jenkins job on this branch.
content.html: @jrivero, I found some small bugs in GuiIface_TEST that may have caused it to fail on Jenkins. In particular, if I ran the tests in random order, noINIFile would often fail because the INI property it expected to be at a default value was being set by a previous test. I modified it by calling boost::filesystem::remove(path) and gazebo::gui::stop() after each test, to return the system to its initial state. I'll start another Jenkins job on this branch.
